realtime_memories.content: Extraction pipeline: 28 Excel files → 26 properties, 30,394 values across 11 categories. Scheduler runs twice daily (cron: 0 2,14 * * *), file monitor polls SharePoint every 30 min. Config: EXTRACTION_SCHEDULE_ENABLED=true, FILE_MONITOR_ENABLED=true in backend/.env. Initialized in app/main.py lifespan. [Investment Name] is a template placeholder, not real data.
Frontend API config: src/lib/config.ts appends /api/v1 to base URL (VITE_API_URL). src/lib/api.ts and feature hooks import API_URL from config.ts as single source of truth.
User preference: Be extremely clear and explicit about what actions the user needs to take. Don't assume context — state clearly if no action is needed. User prefers directness over hedging.
Data quality: many properties have 300-600+ errors out of 1,169 fields. Dashboard pages wired to real API data (completed). Extraction page was done first.
Memory consolidated: 10 entries → 5. Removed noise (skill install commands, "claude" typo, CLI help response) and merged related entries. All signal preserved.
